website_summaries.verdict: Although its sonic talents are comparatively modest, the Bose Solo is an exceedingly handsome and easy-to-use sound bar.
pros: The Bose Solo is among the best-looking sound bars available, with a clutter-free pedestal design
The included remote is excellent and dead simple to use
Its sound quality is unambiguously better than a TV's built-in speakers, especially for movies and TV shows
And while it's a little more expensive than some competitors, it's still reasonably priced, especially for Bose
cons: The Solo falls short of the sound quality of both other pedestal sound bars and traditional sound bars that include a wireless subwoofer
It lacks a front-panel display, so you won't know if its volume level is maxed out or not
And the Solo's small size only supports smaller TVs up to 40 pounds

customer_reviews.title: Solo Tv didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and did not work . WOuld not turn on with remote . No power button to turn on actual unit . Amazon rep sent a bose OM remote two days later in hopes it would limit return . Item still not not funciton . Submitted for a return because I ordered another bose solo from a different source which arrived before remote and worked as it should. Unfortunatly the return request was sent to the wrong email and now I am stuck with this non functioning unit
customer_reviews.author: Mg

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was a costly mistake on my part. I had high hopes but it only lasted a year, thought remote was bad so bought another remote----not the problem, Tried to send it to Bose for repair but that was going to cost me another $100 with no guarantee so to the dump it went. Bought another brand that is still working for a quarter of the price of Bose.
customer_reviews.author: M. Richard

customer_reviews.title: Unit doesn't turn on.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived and did not work. I could not turn it on with the remote. No power button to turn on the actual unit. I thought it could be the remote than bought another but still no turn on. Item still, not function. I am think to call to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dinomar seidel

customer_reviews.title: great sound as from any Bose
customer_reviews.text: Bought this refurbished to save money since it was only for a bedroom TV. I had to turn the volume up so high in order to hear it well and the issue on my tv was the sound comes out the back not towards me. After trying many other products that really didn't make enough of a difference I figured it would be worth spending more money to get a Bose product. This sounds system was perfect right out of the box and now I do not need to blast the volume to hear the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome service with BOSE quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I have the newer one since 2016!! I love it!! So I bought the older one for my parents. Because it has less features and less confusing but hey!!! It’s a friggin BOSE!! They are going to love it!! Especially cause they just use the speakers on a “55”flat Screen that point down... a great used product and quick delivery from the seller!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a "system" for my bedroom. I hate when you go from station to station they are all at different volumes. I did not want to get a 6 speaker system with an equalizer because ... it's my friggin bedroom. The Solo system has equalized the sound issues as well as filled my bedroom better with sound. I have a SONY flatscreen. Picture is awesome but the sound was tinny. The only real issue I have with the Solo is it does not allow you to adjust sound levels to your preferences. You have to accept BOSE has tuned the system for optimal performance. But again ... I will accept this because it is a friggin bedroom TV.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Newman

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE  DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: WELL, this unit lasted a mere 3 months. So much for the product description. No wonder the seller only offered a one month return policy.
customer_reviews.author: JOAN SMALL

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is good but not as good as the Bose Sound Bar
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this because our living room has vaulted ceilings and my wife despises all the exposed wires of my old outdated surround system. The sound quality is good but not as good as the Bose Sound Bar. The only draw back is I have not figured out how to sync the power and volume controls with my TV yet. The small remote for the unit can easily be misplaced or lost in furniture. It would be nice if the system came with an automatic setup feature to search for the TV it is connected to so the TV/Cable remote controls everything versus having separate remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C

customer_reviews.title: Finally I can hear the dialog again.
customer_reviews.text: With television shows and movies playing music throughout the show it has been harder and harder for me to hear the dialogue. In fact there have been a few shows that I watched with close captioning enabled because the "background" music was so loud I could not hear the dialogue at all. That problem is now a thing of the past with my new Bose Solo TV Sound. It is absolutely amazing to me how clearly the sound is. The sound is better than the surround sound system that I had previously, without having to hook up external speakers and hide speaker wire. Well done Bose, I do not know how you do it but I am a convert!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: and I was just happy with it
customer_reviews.text: this was an replacement. I originally bought the first one from Bose direct, and I was just happy with it. If you have a flat screen TV, highly recommend you acquire a sound system like the Bose or something similar. Flat screens have great display, but they lack true sound and they don't balance it. Sound systems like the Bose will enhance sound and also balance it out. There are lot's of options available. The one I have is no longer available as new. The first one just DIED!.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy it. About 6 months after our purchase, this speaker started to require frequent re-boots in order to even turn on. We're afraid it is just going to die soon and the seller's return policy won't replace the product so we are stuck with an unreliable, expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Clover

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We have a great TV but the sound was, of course, only so so. Decided we wanted better but didn't want to go the route of a bunch of speakers, etc. So after a lot of research, I decided to give this one a try. Easy set up. I expected a whole big brain damaging afternoon getting it together, was done in less than 10 minutes. The sound is very good. Its a great improvement over the regular TV sound. People mentioned that it wasn't great on bass but I don't hear it. The bass is fine. I highly recommend that if you're looking to improve your sound you give this a try. I think its well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Spyoki

customer_reviews.title: Bose whats not to love !
customer_reviews.text: So its plug and play and sounds awesome . We have had the small Cube versions but they are a pain to install they do sound better in a larger media room . But a living room or den this things Rocks . Our Kids love watching movies with it because it fills the whole room with sound and takes 5 minutes to set up . Bose rocks
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I had to build a simple shelf to place the TV on, as it was over the recommended weight limit to set on the Solo, and even though severely tech challenged, read the instructions and hooked up the Solo to the TV in about 20 minutes. Having read other reviews, I knew that the Solo was not the equivalent of expensive high end stereo speakers, but it has a great sound, especially in the mid-range area. I like that it is very simple, almost Apple-like in it's basic approach to it's task. For less than 400 bucks, am very happy. It is so much better than the sound that came with the lower end Samsung TV.
customer_reviews.author: Big John

customer_reviews.title: No miracles
customer_reviews.text: This system improved the stock sound system of my TV. However, don't expect to all of a sudden have the New York Philharmonic Orchestra sitting in your living room when you plug this baby in. Yes, volume is pumped up and there is a definite improvement in fidelity and richness of tones, but it isn't earth shattering. Still, I think the expense is worth it if you will be using this system in a room that doesn't have perfect acoustics.
customer_reviews.author: Vince Rock

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much as advertised...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 2 weeks now and we use this with the 48" LCD in the bedroom. Tried out Elvis' Alternate Aloha DVD, and concert DVDs by Metallica and AC/DC. Rocks the room pretty good. As for watching regular TV (everything other than HD movies), we really don't need the Bose. Pretty good low-end, bass sound...not a lot of high-end treble sound (but using the TVs speakers for treble seems to work well). My only criticism is that you have to separately turn on and off the Bose via the remote. I haven't found an on/off switch on the unit itself...but I'll keep looking! Tom Harvey author of "The Eighties: A Bitchen Time To Be a Teenager!"
customer_reviews.author: Tom Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the first 2 years and then after that it stopped working properly. In order for it to work, everytime I turn on the tv I have to unplug the sound system for five minutes then it will work. I have to do it ever single time though and it's very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a couple of years and then just died
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a couple of years and then just died. Bose support says to unplug it for a minute to allow it to reset. Did that, no response. For the amount this item cost I expected better from Bose. Will not buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Herdpiper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how cheap my TV speakers were until I bought the Bose Solo Sound System. Easy to install and it's perfect for my bedroom. I used closed caption while watching movies because the dialogue was hard to hear when there was a lot of special effects. With the Bose Solo, the dialogue comes out crisp and clear along with the sound effects. I'm very satisfied, a must have for the TV in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Broke before a year
customer_reviews.text: It broke in less than a year. It makes loud static noise every 10 min. Unfortunately I can't return it either. Any info around sending it to Bose maybe to repair would be great. thanks,/R
customer_reviews.author: Ros

customer_reviews.title: Sound not the greatest,but better than rear speakers on back of TV
customer_reviews.text: We liked this at first but after 5 months of ownership and having to replace expensive batteries for the remote twice I would recommend buyer be cautious. We do not watch TV that often, the remote is the only way to turn this speaker on or off. We have since contacted Bose about our problem and were advised to unplug the power cord for 5 minutes, apparently the "capacitor" gets overwhelmed with data and needs to be reset. It worked and we now have sound from in front of the TV and we are happy. The only reason I gave it a 4 out of 5 rating is because the speaker is expensive and the issue with the capacitor.
customer_reviews.author: NavyMom

customer_reviews.title: Solo Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from a Bose product. I usually do more research before buying but spent less time before my purchase because of brand. I set this up in an averGe size bedroom and wasn't very far from the TV or speaker. I suppose it does do what they claim somewhat but not enough to justify the price. It was not the spoken word eye opening experience as claimed. Combined with the very annoying "solo" remote- which can't be paired any other remote I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: retiringtoNH

customer_reviews.title: Love the Bose sound system
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love the Bose sound system. The sound is amazing and we can finally watch TV and hear everything without having to crank up the volume. My only complaint is the directions that come with the system tell you to connect it to your tv when really we needed to run it through our Direct TV box. If you connect it directly to the tv without running it through your cable box it doesn't work. I don't know a whole lot of people who don't have cable so Bose might want to update their instructions. Other than the directions the Bose Solo TV sound system is amazing and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Morse

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE BOSE!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this TV Sound System because we have a large living room and the TV Speakers were not enough. If the volume was turned up for the family sitting in the back to hear it - it was too loud for those sitting close. I don't have a thousand dollars to spend on a surround system. With the Bose Solo TV Sound System it has made a huge different. Great sound and perfect level for the whole room. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J Davis

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: A whole lot of MEH. I have a 20 yo Bose 3 unit system that blows this thing out the water. I like the remote, its only got 4 buttons. In retrospect, i shouldve known i wouldnt be happy with a $200 unit regardless of manufacturer, but i hope it lasts forever like my last Bose did. It came in some jankey packaging too.. not the end of the world but i expected to be unboxing a box straight from Bose, not a bubble wrap nightmare someone did in their kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: steve harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a Bose Solo Sound System and am 100% satisfied. Not only does it sound fantastic and improve the quality of a television's sound, but it is also extremely user friendly. It took me about 5 minutes to hook it up to my Panasonic Flat Screen using the optical cord. I purchased an extra remote control so that there would be two remotes at different locations....for my spouse and me. I have had a less expensive system sound bar that pales in comparison to this unit. Five stars our of 5 and the Bose name behind it! Dr. Dennis M. Spinella
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M. Spinella

customer_reviews.title: Best TV sound I have heard.
customer_reviews.text: I have never been satisfied with the quality of sound directly from an affordable TV. In my case, surround sound was an overkill, and my stereo speakers were in the wrong location for effective TV sound. When I saw the add for Bose Solo, I decided to try it. Installation was a snap. When I turned on the TV the sound was natural and balanced. The self shut off when it has been muted for too long takes some getting used to, but I can live with it. It is not a replacement for surround sound, but it's hi-fi stereo sound is perfect most programming and Blu-Tooth and DVD viewing. I would (and already have) recommend this to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Deck

customer_reviews.title: it works well enough although not the very best from Bose
customer_reviews.text: good enogh for most rooms and most listeners. may be lacking a bit of bass. would have been better if it had a button to improve dialogue quality like other model;s of bose soundbars
customer_reviews.author: Prof Peter Lim

customer_reviews.title: GREAT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, this is NOT a home cinema. It brings a whole new level of sound enjoyment to my flat screen TV. I hear sounds I never ever heard before. I listen to the music channels on my cable system during the day and the audio quality is amazing. It is also a BREEZE to set up. Typical of Bose quality and engineering. My friends have heard me raze about it and when the hear it for the first time they are really amazed. 2 have already purchased their own. I highly recommend this device for people who want to enjoy quality sound but for whatever reason do not want to go the whole home cinema route.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Coath

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: We saw the product in an ad on TV and had been looking for a better sound system for our TV. Our living room has a cathedral ceiling and the acoustics are terrible. Our TV is a new Toshiba but I found that we always had to turn the sound way up to hear words well. We got the Bose system for Christmas and had no problem hooking it up to TV. Immediately we could tell a difference in the sound quality. We turned the volume way down and could still hear more clearly. The base is strong in it which sounds great. I am very pleased with this system and highly reccommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jo c

customer_reviews.title: Has helped a lot with sound issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas because he turns the tv volume up so high that you can't think. It has solved that problem. Now he listens to the tv at a perfect level. We are amazed at all the background sounds that we never heard before! Only gripe, universal remote will not control device volume. Turns it on and off but not up and down. Bose says buy theirs. I don't want to buy theirs, I want to use the one I have. Oh well, this gift was well worth the money and I would purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Bose delivers!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Bose Solo system for my TV in the bedroom, did not want a home theater system with all the speakers. The Solo was easy to set up and it has a couple of options to connect to your TV. The sound quality was great! I couldn't believe the Solo could sound that good without an amplified stereo receiver. The price to me seemed a little high but the sound quality to me makes it worth it, I am considering another for another room. So far no problems and would recommend the Bose Solo to a friend. PS in Corpus Christi, TX
customer_reviews.author: T55Guy

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds great
customer_reviews.text: We had a sound bar and remote sub woofer before we started to use this. My only complaint, and a minor one, is that there is no way to adjust the audio. I thought this may be a problem, but after using it for 2 months or so, I don't think we've come across a time when we actually needed or wanted to change the settings. This think also looks great. It fits nicely under a 46" LG HDTV. The TV sits on the bose - the tv stand looks like it was made to fit on the Bose, the dimensions match that well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob LaBlaw

customer_reviews.title: OK, Not a Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I have a TV that doesn't have an external audio outlet so I can only use this system through the cable converter and I can't use it when I am streaming Roku, so the use is limited, too much so for the price. Seems to me, this is overpriced by at least $100. However, it look ssleek and has the Bose quality and the TV soun dis good. Just make sure your TV has an external audio outlet otherwise you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound but stopped working after 18 months. Took it to a sound tech and he said it was not worth fixing. Next purchase will be a cheap imitation. Also there is no on off switch on the box itself. Must use the remote.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Thibodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Bose Solo tv sound system
customer_reviews.text: i have used this wonderful device and found it better than any other output speakers. Sound is so great that i dont need connection to any home theatre again. there are many beautiful sounds in TV programmes which TV speakers dont bring out. this bose solo tv sound system brings them out very clearly and distinctively. This is the best sound system i have ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Pusa

customer_reviews.title: good sound but over transmits the background noise
customer_reviews.text: We were tired of trying to deal with external speakers and tuners and decided to try this. The sound is very good, but not too much of a difference from our Sharp TV internal speakers. It rounds out the sound a bit, but has one serious downside: If you have a dvr cable box, it magnifies and over transmits the background noise from the box. This isn't a problem with regular TV shows, but with news or talk channels, it can get distracting.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Cabot

customer_reviews.title: Bose Solo TV sound system was one of the best buys I've ever purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Bose Solo TV sound system was one of the best buys I've ever purchased from Amazon. The cost, well "What a great deal I got", can't purchase that sound system for that price today! The Bose solo TV sound system is still working really well even today!
customer_reviews.author: Big Z

customer_reviews.title: Rich Deep Sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased from Amazon warehouse and appeared in almost brand new condition. This is my 3rd Bose Sound bar and have not had any problem with either, Connected to my TV via optical out to the Bose Optical in and sounds so much better than TV speakers alone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Going sol with this Bose
customer_reviews.text: Love anything Bose. Got it on time and it only took a few minutes to open, set up and begin enjoying. The sound is clear and you can really crank this high. The quality is as usual... Bose perfect. One simply remote to turn off and on and turn the volume up or down. Just plug it in to one of the recommended or available TV jacks and play.. that's it! Got rid of my old system and couldn't be happier with this! Bose delivers quality once again!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Wlodarski

customer_reviews.title: Just nice sound
customer_reviews.text: I know not many TV's have great sound (or any). So I saw this advertised in a magazine I was reading and though I would check into it. Went to Bose site and then checked Amazon and found I could save $49.00 on Amazon.(with free shipping too). This is not surround sound, but my TV sure sounds much better and I'm happy with my purchase. Bose is not cheap-but I would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: An expensive disappointment
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. In order to use this with a cable box hookup, we now have to go through a frustrating routine to get sound after turning on our TV. We don't get sound until after alternately pushing "aux" and "power" over and over. And we're not sure if it makes that much difference in the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi F-H

customer_reviews.title: Boss has turned my leisure hours around!
customer_reviews.text: I wondered about my need for the Bose system, but each time I turn on my TV I am grateful I opted to buy one. I have a hearing problem and sometimes struggled to catch the dialog. Musical programs were beginning to lose their appeal because the sound always seemed a bit distorted. No more! Bose has made listening the pleasure it was meant to be. And I'm talking bout a brand-new TV with ll the bells and whistles,
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: It's a GREAT product
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it!! It's like your at the movies in your owm home
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Typical Bose sound; great right out of the box. This is by no means a steroidal surround, base booming video experience. That said, it is light years ahead of stock TV speakers and neatly solves speaker placement issues. If you're familiar with Bose products, sound output runs somewhere between their clock radio and the Acoustic Wave boom box. Although there is no subwoofer, Bose typically folds a lot of base into a small box and this unit is no exception. The sound is well balanced with plenty of grunt for a small to medium sized room.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Bartscht

customer_reviews.title: I love this and I hate everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Samsung Smart Tv which had a beautiful picture and horrible sound, making me look for a surround sound option. In my search I came across the Bose solo and took a shot. Well am I happy, and that is saying something as I am a real pain in the a** about most things. If you want great sound without the fuss of the surround sound install, this is for you
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A DeSimone

customer_reviews.title: Love this sound system
customer_reviews.text: I have other Bose products and wanted a system without having the "big box" on the floor. This system is perfect for our use. I even bought it as a "used, like new" and got a heck of a deal. Am very pleased. Great,sound and easy for a non techy person like me to hook up in 5 minutes! Only thing is I wish it had a number display for volume. Our previous Bose did and I knew exactly what nu,bear to set the volume at
customer_reviews.author: Joni R.

customer_reviews.title: didn't really improve the sound.
customer_reviews.text: I had two problems with this and ended up returning it. First the box required me to turn it on every time. I remember the days when you would plug several things into a power strip and turning on the strip would turn on everything -but no more. More importantly however, I didn't really notice a significant improvement over the surround sound that comes in my Panasonic TV. That probably says as much about my TV as it does about this mid-priced sound box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No need for more speakers one is enough
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't always a big fan of Bose and getting the best sound. I was lucky enough to be introduced to Bose via my car speakers. I then got the blue tooth speaker. Then I visited a Bose store and got a chance to hear the Solo. Just WOW, the sound is amazing. I was hearing movies like never before. There was an blinking neon sign and I could hear the sound it makes. I was amazed! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: G. G. Sanchez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small living room or mid sized bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this device is amazing, from the feeling that there are more speakers than this one device, to swearing you heard sound behind you when it is not. If you are getting older, as I am, then you will love the voice technology which, no matter how low you set the volume, you can make out every word that is said. The only issue I have, is the enormous cost, though the price I paid here was the lowest, it is still, in my opinion, way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: MikeSkysoldier

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of the teeny speakers in my HD LED TV. Saw the ads about this product, and thought what the heck, I'll give it a try. Wow, what a full, rich sound! Filled the room. Played it loud using a music channel with no distortion. Having to have another remote is always a pain, but worth the inconvenience. I recommend it to anyone who knows there's something better out there in the world. (First experienced Bose speakers back in 1973, when in Boston. Great!.- so I knew it would be good)
customer_reviews.author: Les Wilmot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an upgraded sound system to the factory speakers in my big screen TV that would fit into a regular stand and not require a separate sub-woofer. The Bose Solo does just this. It will not deliver theatre quality surround sound but it's pretty darn good. It looks beautiful and is absolutely simple to hook up. I tried it out beforehand in a local electronics store and knew it was perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for TV!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and doing the whole surround-sound systems wasn't an option. Enter the Bose Solo TV system. Thank God for Bose! I get super quality sound with a surround-like affect from one box. My TV sits right on top of it. I used the optical sound cable that came with the Bose and WOW! Great Bose quality sound at all volume levels. And yes, it can get loud! But very clear at all volumes.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our tv sound!
customer_reviews.text: The Bose Solo TV Sound System has changed the way we "hear" our favorite TV shows and movies. The speakers on our tv were great, but I had problems hearing "clearly" and my husband was convinced it was my hearing. I purchased the Bose as a Christmas gift for us. After plugging it in (easy install) we were amazed by the clarity of the sound. We turned the volume on the tv to zero! The Bose makes the sound crisp, clear and it give more of a surround sound. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Tinker

customer_reviews.title: The Bose Solo
customer_reviews.text: Rendered my TV speakers pointless. Such a small piece of technology that has turned my bedroom into a theater. The audible depth of the bass and clarity of the spoken word are beyond fantastic! This is the third Bose product that I have procured (3 piece surround sound for living room, system for my parents and this). I have never experienced sound like this! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Wade Carson

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This sound system works as advertised. It enhanced the sound and clarity of my Panasonic 55" TV by at least 50 per cent. You could always buy a more elaborate system, but, for the money and the ease of set-up, this works for me. This is my first Bose product, so, I'll see as time goes by. I'd recommend the system to anyone. Especially, if you are limited on space or just don't want all the clutter of a bigger sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hill

customer_reviews.title: Product lasted 4 years then died.
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased in May 2013. I have had 4 years of pretty good sound from my smart tv using this product. I would have hoped that the product would have lasted longer than four years but it has not. The product does not work. After following the manufactueres instructions and unplugging the device for several days and connecting it to the tv it starting working again but then a loud humming noise started and I had to disconnect the speaker. Personally, I would have expected a longer service from a Bose product. There is a newer model of this product but will most likely consider another competetor that is less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Bose Solo TV Sound System
customer_reviews.text: I think we all know that the new flat TV's just don't have the sound that they should. We got tired of trying to figure out what the people were mumbling about on our favorite programs and decided to try the Bose. This sound system has made it easier to under- stand what the people are saying but it's still not "perfect".....much improved but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JoyceW

customer_reviews.title: I can HEAR my TV now!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea how "weak" my 47" Vizio sounded until I bought this Bose sound system. The reviews about the clarity of voice are spot on... and the deep bass, even in speech, is such a noticeable improvement from my TV speaker I use the Bose for ALL of my TV watching... including the evening news! I hoped that the price would go down and I watched this item for months, but that was a mistake... it is worth every penny to me.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Word

customer_reviews.title: Good sound!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality much better than my TV Speakers. Wish it had more Audio inputs. Only way it works with my digital cable box and tv right now is if it is plugged into cable box. Sound works on by big screen tv, but not on Blue Ray or Roku. IMO, for the money, this should have multiple digital audio inputs.
customer_reviews.author: Mickmirror

customer_reviews.title: Bose TV sound system
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is true to the "Bose" name. It delivers a phenomenal sound in a small package. We had tried another brand that was by the same manufacturer as our TV and you couldn't understand the speech because the base was too heavy. This speaker gives terrific base, with crisp treble, so that every word is understandable. My husband and I both have diminshed hearing, and this speaker is PERFECT. Worth every penny we spent!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and Bose is known for great quality. That said, it is better than my tv speakers which were going south. To me it was not worth the money I spent. It still isn't any clearer with voices and you need to turn it up and down to hear everything in a movie. We could have bought something much cheaper and got the same outcome.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Hear the sounds you've missed.
customer_reviews.text: This is one piece, simple to install and the sound is fantastic. I still find myself wondering what some of the sounds are and realize how much I've missed in hearing over the years. Best gift I ever gave to myself. The first time I heard Christmas music through the speaker I almost cried because of the intense clarity. If there has to be a drawback, it's the tiny, I mean TINY, remote to turn it on. Otherwise, 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: gingerbreadbunny

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could use it in two story home bottom floor. It resonates through the ceilings and my daughter complains. It does create sounds that my flat screen does not and can listen to speech that is more clear. I wish I had an earphone jack that I could use for my enjoyment. Also through the cable box we can listen to music without the flat screen being on. Soundscapes music at night. What a nice feature in a small unit.
customer_reviews.author: WOW!

customer_reviews.title: Hard of hearing
customer_reviews.text: Thought this might cure my hearing problems, not so. I do love it, however it is not a hearing aid. It helps my poor hearing significantly but certain sounds I still cannot hear. Love the Base which is not adjustable but for me just right. Personally I believe it is worth the money and believe the sound is way better than the 55" Sony it is coupled to.
customer_reviews.author: WRIGHTAmer

customer_reviews.title: Bose Solo speaker.....
customer_reviews.text: Guys..... i am not sure if i could get use to the sound on this speaker. My room has high vaulted ceilings, and it always sounded like there was an echo. I did turn off the Sony TV speakers to off, just to be sure. I tried a multiple of movies, and cable programs, and it just did not seem to be worth it. MY one year old Bose speaker box, that does Radio, and CD, and iPod ROCKS.......... sound from it is truely amazing. But the Bose Solo was a disappointment. Thanks guys, and am sorry. William in Broomfield
customer_reviews.author: William Harlan

customer_reviews.title: bose solo
customer_reviews.text: My surround sound system went out and could not be repaired so I went with the sound from the television which was not the best I have heard. I purchased the Bose solo system and installation was a snap which was nice. The sound quality versus the TV sound was a great improvement but I did not find the system to be as wonderful as many people say it is.
customer_reviews.author: bwld841

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: The design is sleek and spare. The sound is pretty awesome for a one-unit speaker system. It won't match a 5 speaker system -- in price or sound. But if you want good sound and you don't have a lot of space for surround sound, this will give you everything you could hope for. The sound is full and rich and the volume can go very, very loud. I've been delighted since I've been using this Bose (my favorite audio brand), and I would definitely recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney B.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, with very easy setup
customer_reviews.text: If in needs of a good, deep sound (albeit not very spatial) and an extremely painless setup, this is the product to look for. I have a medium sized room (about 250sq. feet) and I didn't want to have too many cables and connection to deal with, so this looked like the perfect solution to me. Only drawback is that the remote lacks even basic treble/bass settings, as it only has volume.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano E.

customer_reviews.title: Bose Surround System
customer_reviews.text: I have only 20% hearing remaining in both of my ears. The Bose TV sound system was a blessing. Honestly, I thought I heard the doorbell ringing, and when I went to the door, I realized that it was the television. The sounds are almost like surround sound. It defines the outdoors and you hear things that you are unable to on regular television. I recommend purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and simple to hook up
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars except for 2 things: 1. I have to use the Bose remote to turn it on & off, I was able to program my Directv remote to control sound level and mute. 2. The base was overpowering until I put foam blocks in the back to tone it down.
customer_reviews.author: woodman

customer_reviews.title: Bose products
customer_reviews.text: The sound sudden died on me, so I unhooked the wire from the TV, the optical one, re inserted it again, worked fine, as always, Bose does make some great products, this is one of them.....
customer_reviews.author: vark

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe my ears. Forget additional speakers, this product "delivers". It is literally a plug and play. Within minutes I had this product set up in living room, and was very satisfied with the sound quality. I've never been disappointed by Bose, but was initially skeptical of this particular product. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Starbuck

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for a small room, but not a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok for a small room, but not a larger room. You should spend the extra money for a full "surround sound" system if you are in a room larger than 10x10.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Batty

customer_reviews.title: Needs some form of on screen display for loudness.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, was easy to set up, was just what I needed for my setup, but I'd really like to have some form of on screen feedback for the loudness level. Each of the devices I use has its own level of output and they are not the same, I'd like to have a reference that would help me get the sound level right as quickly as I select a device.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis D Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound from such a small system.
customer_reviews.text: I know Bose makes great systems, but I was shocked by the level of sound that come out of this small system. I was watching LOTR and you can hear the horses hooves hitting the ground, and Shelob's (giant spider) near silent "footsteps". I don't know how well the base would sound in a larger room, but for a smallish room it sounds pretty good. I do wish that the system had buttons on it, because it is completely dependent on the remote, so don't lose it!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a dramatic improvement over built-in TV speakers
customer_reviews.text: I expected to hear a significant improvement over my built-in TV speakers, but the improvement is negligible. Also, there is no menu or video interface between this item and my TV screen -- i.e., no way to make adjustments to audio nor even to see an image of the volume level. I am returning the item because for my needs, it's definitely not worth the $399 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Better than TV speakers but ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because flat panel speakers are atrocious in general. This speaker set from Bose is certainly better than TV speakers but all in all underwhelming. In comparison the speakers on our old 27" Panasonic CRT TV are actually better than this Bose set. OK, but if we had to do it again we'd probably try to fit a sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Cheap-n-Easy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: Item worked great from Sept 2018 to Feb 2020. Then, one day as I was watching tv, a static sound consumed the speaker. The only way to stop it was to unplug the unit. I waited 10 min, plugged it back in, and it no longer works. Guess that’s what I get for buying a 150$ Bose unit. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in years I can understand dialog on tv and don't need close captioning. Easy hook up (two wires) and great performance. Wish they hadn't discontinued it as it's a great product. Will try to buy another for the bedroom tv before they're sold out.
customer_reviews.author: H. R. Coley

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but not great and no current capabilities like ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but not great and no current capabilities like blue tooth. I recently bought a Yamaha and it is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dave.B

customer_reviews.title: Predefined settings optimized for every sound coming out of your tv and devices connected to the tv
customer_reviews.text: Bose Solo has predefined settings optimized for every sound coming out of your tv. I have my tv connected to my computer (via airparrot 10$), apple tv and roku; so every sound coming from these devices (including itunes songs) is output from Bose. Quality of dialogues and sound effects has improved by 50%. I bought it for 400$, but todays 360$ makes it a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer NY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this system. Very good system for the money. Use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better sound from our TV.  UNRELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: A great addition to our TV, it greatly enhanced the sound and made speech much more intelligible. This is NOT intended to be an audiophile speaker system, but it serves its intended purpose very well. Changed the rating to one-star because of reliability issues -- two consecutive devices failed within 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: John Borgoy

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: The unit is not a surround sound, but it greatly enhances the TV sound. I have it under a 37" Vizio in my bed room and it projects sound and at times, I feel like it is surrounding me. I definately reccommend this unit for someone who does not want a lot of wires runneing and is not concerned with actual surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin L. Suthers

customer_reviews.title: Better than TV speakers
customer_reviews.text: How much I'm not sure. My new Samsung HDTV has pretty good sound. Is the improved bass from the Solo worth $400? To me it is but I'm not sure about others. On a scale of 1-10 if my TV speakers are a 2 and the Bose 321 system I have on another TV is an 8 I would say the Bose Solo falls around 5. Not bad but not great either.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alan Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but limited on volume
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but limited on volume. It gets loud, more than loud enough for TV, but not for music if you want to leave the doors and windows open to play music through the TV's Bluetooth setting and be able to hear it well from the patio right outside
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use with 42" flat screen tv. What a great improvement in sound quality. It was super easy to install. I read the directions,followed them and in about 5 minutes was using my new Bose sound device. Another plus for me was that it is one solitary unit and not a lot of speakers or wiring. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Artist1224

customer_reviews.title: Average at best
customer_reviews.text: This product is truly under-featured! I really don't appreciate needing another remote to hear marginally improved tv sound. So I tried to integrate into my Directv remote. Now, I grew up in the technology field and I couldn't find any of the codes listed by Bose to work. As a last resort, I purchased a Logitech Harmony and programmed it with everything I needed to program. The result is that my marginally improved sound cost me about $450. It's a good thing that I didn't start my career as a financier!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Bose Solo TV Sound System
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. My HD TV sound system works just a well as this unit and is already part of the set. I bought this because they advertised it as a system that will truely improve your listening experience. For $300, it was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: (Allan) Jim Nicolow

customer_reviews.title: Bose is definately a quality product
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to purchase a Bose product but thought they were a tad expensive. This is an excellent addition to a home entertainment center. I like to listen to Pandora on my TV and this has made it so much more enjoyable...I have Bass finally! Rich sound textures and it is better for music and dialogue when watching a movie. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: 1Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've seen other reviews, and I own > 6 BOSE products, so, keep your expectations on vastly improved TV sound for a reasonably sized room for a great price, and you'll be delighted. As with all BOSE products, I strongly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Horton

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Bose Solo because I was having trouble hearing the TV on those crappy speakers they put on flat screen TVs. The first one they sent was defective (optical audio stopped working inside of a month) but the replacement is carrying on big time and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: A full clean sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have my 42" flat screen sitting on top of it. There's no sub, so your not going to get room shaking bass. For a bedroom it's great. If like me you have your TV on a timer to automatically automatically turn its self off, the Bose Solo will turn its self off. Is it audio-file, no: When you just want a good clean sounding easy to set up and operate system, you can't beat this one. It comes with an analog cable, not a digital one: You'll have to buy that yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Bevil

customer_reviews.title: Marvellous sound!  Another great Bose product
customer_reviews.text: This Bose gives really clear sound, which helps as I am a little hard of hearing. Now I can hear every word, and words and sounds from DVD movies that I have never heard before! I was hooked on it right away after listening to Beethoven's Brandenburg Concerto. Very reasonable price for such an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann F. Rapp

customer_reviews.title: I am not sure why movie makers feel this is a good thing. My headphone work better for me but ...
customer_reviews.text: I am older and am getting hard of hearing. The Bose does help with sound. However, it does not cure the problem of soft voices with background music. I am not sure why movie makers feel this is a good thing. My headphone work better for me but this unit does help with some programs
customer_reviews.author: Aleck Shilaos

customer_reviews.title: Bose TV sound system
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS... Never thought I could enjoy a movie or tv shows so much. No more screaming at you from commercials, or turning the sound up tryin to hear what they were saying over the back ground noise/music/etc. Found that I can use the Dish remote control to operate my Bose solo.
customer_reviews.author: John Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my 89 year old father who is hard of hearing and watches TV most of the day. This has helped him understand dialogue more and he appreciates the sound on the music channels. It was easy to install and we knew he would be happier with a remote that has on/off and up/down buttons only. Pricey, but worth it for him.
customer_reviews.author: jtc

customer_reviews.title: Content
customer_reviews.text: I researched this product before making the purchase. The give and take, limited control capability, was a factor. However, the sound quality, compact nature and price proved to be a deal close. Having used it now for a month I am content with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Velasco

customer_reviews.title: A great help for us who are hearing impaired.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I watch a lot of BBC television along with US shows but we were unable to catch all the words being spoken. The Bose Solo TV Sound System has helped tremendously with this problem and has made TV much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1563

product_meta.title: Bose Solo TV Sound System
product_meta.description:
Love watching TV? Well, it’s about to get dramatically better. The Bose Solo TV sound system reveals much more of the depth and detail you’re meant to hear in your favorite programs. The kind of sound most flat panel TVs simply cannot reproduce from their internal speakers.

What's in the Box
Bose Solo TV sound system
Remote control
Power cord
Optical digital audio cable
Analog cable
feature_bullets: Wide, even sound throughout the room from Bose speaker array technology
More effects, music and dialogue, clearly and naturally, with proprietary digital signal processing
Single speaker fits neatly under your HDTV, no additional equipment needed
Extremely easy setup, with one connection to your TV and one plug to the wall
Simple four-button remote with power, mute and volume

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars1,255 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
